sentences.english: Skeletal Mastery research time reduced to 30 seconds from 45 seconds.

sentences.english: In China, to use a finger to point or beckon is rude.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，用一個指頭指別人或招喚別人是不禮貌的。

sentences.english: It calls monsters from the moon.

sentences.english: We raise the devil just for pleasure .
